# sen-card


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                   | Default   | Description        |
|------------------------|-----------|--------------------|
| `--card-border-color`  | `#DEDCDC` | outer border color |
| `--card-border-radius` | `0`       | border radius      |
| `--card-padding`       | `8px`     | the inner padding  |
| `--card-margin`        | `8px`     | the outer margin   |
